record.description: [[:nl:Beatrijs|Beatrijs]]. This text is folium 001r-init of the manuscript KB 76 E 5 containing [[:nl:Dietsche doctrinale|Die Dietsche Doctrinale]] by [[:nl:Jan van Boendale|Jan van Boendale]], [[:nl:Beatrijs|Beatrijs]], Dit es vanden aflate van Rome, Die heimelicheit der heimelicheden by [[:nl:Jacob van Maerlant|Jacob van Maerlant]] and other texts
record.title: [[:nl:Beatrijs|Beatrijs]]
record.dimensions: Folium size: {{Size|mm|257|190}} - Block size: {{Size|mm|185|150}} with 2 columns and 37 lines
record.notes: Text in Dutch. Script is Littera textualis
record.description: Folio 001r-init from Beatrijsssssss =====Illuminations on this folio 001r-init===== *The historiated initial shows Albertan of Brescia(?) and four philosophers: Seneca, Ovid, Avicenna and Sidrach *Author, poet writing ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/48C911 48C911]) *Scholar, philosopher (+ portrait of scholar, scientist) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49C3(+3) 49C3(+3)]) *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (o) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(O) 49L12(O)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Historical person (albertan of brescia) - scene directly related with life or life-story (albertan of brescia) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/61B2(ALBERTAN OF BRESCIA)21 61B2(ALBERTAN OF BRESCIA)21]) *Historical person (avicenna) - historical person (avicenna) portrayed alone (+ compositional variants of portrait) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/61B2(AVICENNA)11(+5) 61B2(AVICENNA)11(+5)]) *Historical person (sidrach) - historical person (sidrach) portrayed alone (+ compositional variants of portrait) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/61B2(SIDRACH)11(+5) 61B2(SIDRACH)11(+5)]) *(story of) ovid - portrait of person from classical history (+ head, bust, etc.) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/98B(OVID)9(+5) 98B(OVID)9(+5)]) *(story of) seneca - portrait of person from classical history (+ head, bust, etc.) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/98B(SENECA)9(+5) 98B(SENECA)9(+5)])

record.description: Folio 007v-init from Beatrijsssssss =====Illuminations on this folio 007v-init===== *The historiated initial shows Albertan of Brescia(?) *Author reading from his own work ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/48C913 48C913]) *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (u) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(U) 49L12(U)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Historical person (albertan of brescia) - scene directly related with life or life-story (albertan of brescia) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/61B2(ALBERTAN OF BRESCIA)21 61B2(ALBERTAN OF BRESCIA)21])

record.description: Folio 033v-init from Beatrijsssssss =====Illuminations on this folio 033v-init===== *The historiated initial shows The Trinity (Mercy-Seat); the symbols of the four Evangelists *God the father holding the crucifix, 'gnadenstuhl', mercy-seat, throne of grace ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11B3231 11B3231]) *The four symbols of the evangelists, 'the apocalyptic beasts' ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11I42 11I42]) *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (d) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(D) 49L12(D)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171])

record.description: Folio 047v-init from Beatrijsssssss =====Illuminations on this folio 047v-init===== *The historiated initial shows Beatrijs kneeling before Mary holding the Christ-child *Mary standing (or half-length), the christ-child sitting on her arm (christ-child to mary's left) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11F4122 11F4122]) *Legends and miracles ~ mary ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11F83 11F83]) *Nun(s) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11P31522 11P31522]) *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (u) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(U) 49L12(U)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Historical person (beatrijs) - fictitious scene ~ historical person (beatrijs) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/61B2(BEATRIJS)22 61B2(BEATRIJS)22])

record.description: Folio 061v-init from Beatrijsssssss =====Illuminations on this folio 061v-init===== *The historiated initial shows Alexander and Aristotle *(story of) alexander the great ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/98B(ALEXANDER THE GREAT) 98B(ALEXANDER THE GREAT)]) *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (d) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(D) 49L12(D)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Aristotle ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/98B(ARISTOTLE) 98B(ARISTOTLE)])
